title: Rihanna Shows Off Her Avant-Garde Maternity Style in Alaïa
description: The singer changed for dinner in Santa Monica following the Los Angeles premiere of Smurfs.
excerpt: The singer changed for dinner in Santa Monica following the Los Angeles premiere of Smurfs.
text: THE RUNDOWNOn Sunday evening, Rihanna was spotted dining at Giorgio Baldi in Los Angeles. She sported an Alaïa skirt from the summer-fall 2025 runway collection and custom knit crop top. Earlier in the day, the singer attended the Smurfs premiere in Los Angeles in full custom Saint Laurent. Rihanna has been gracing fans with one show-stopping style moment after another, appearing everywhere from the Dior show in Paris to the Smurfs movie premiere. Last night in Santa Monica, the singer and makeup mogul was spotted leaving Giorgio Baldi in an all-white sculptural set styled by her longtime collaborator Jahleel Weaver. In the words of Cher Horowitz in Clueless, “This is an Alaïa!”The star’s sequin skirt, which debuted on Alaïa’s summer-fall 2025 runway, featured a low-rise padded waistband that added an architectural element to the ensemble. She paired the skirt with a custom white hooded knit crop top, proudly showing off her pregnancy with her third child. She appeared hand-in-hand with her sons, 3-year-old RZA and almost-2-year-old Riot. The two competed with their mother for best dressed in custom Dior from Jonathan Anderson—sporting delft dress-inspired cargo shorts, a men’s bar jacket, and all.Rihanna and A$AP Rocky attended Anderson’s runway alongside industry veterans and celebrity supporters a mere few weeks earlier. html:
THE RUNDOWN

  • On Sunday evening, Rihanna was spotted dining at Giorgio Baldi in Los Angeles.
  • She sported an Alaïa skirt from the summer-fall 2025 runway collection and custom knit crop top.
  • Earlier in the day, the singer attended the Smurfs premiere in Los Angeles in full custom Saint Laurent.

Rihanna has been gracing fans with one show-stopping style moment after another, appearing everywhere from the Dior show in Paris to the Smurfs movie premiere. Last night in Santa Monica, the singer and makeup mogul was spotted leaving Giorgio Baldi in an all-white sculptural set styled by her longtime collaborator Jahleel Weaver. In the words of Cher Horowitz in Clueless, “This is an Alaïa!”

The star’s sequin skirt, which debuted on Alaïa’s summer-fall 2025 runway, featured a low-rise padded waistband that added an architectural element to the ensemble. She paired the skirt with a custom white hooded knit crop top, proudly showing off her pregnancy with her third child.

Outside Giorgio Baldi on Sunday evening. 

The skirt on the Alaïa summer-fall 2025 runway. 

Earlier in the day, Rihanna walked the blue carpet for the Los Angeles premiere of the Smurfs movie in custom Saint Laurent fall 2025 womenswear by Anthony Vaccarello. She appeared hand-in-hand with her sons, 3-year-old RZA and almost-2-year-old Riot. The two competed with their mother for best dressed in custom Dior from Jonathan Anderson—sporting delft dress-inspired cargo shorts, a men’s bar jacket, and all.

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky attended Anderson’s runway alongside industry veterans and celebrity supporters a mere few weeks earlier. Now, on the carpets, there couldn’t be a better time for Anderson to delve into custom Dior, nor is it too soon for these future fashion icons to make their mark.
